item.title: Network Plus Course: Mastering Network Ports and Protocols

item.title: Visual Studio Code vs Visual Studio Community and Enterprise: Which is Best for Developers?
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Software Development" , "Integrated Development Environment (IDE)" , "Microsoft Development Tools" , "Code Editors" , "Development Platforms" , "Software Comparison" , "Programming Languages" , "Collaborative Development" , "Enterprise Software Development" , "Code Debugging"
